title: Avgolemono (chicken-lemon-rice soup)
steps: Bring the chicken broth to a boil
Add the starch of your choice and boil until cooked
In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs and lemon juice
Ladle out some broth (avoiding the starch) and slowly add it to the egg/lemon while still whisking vigorously
Stir the egg/lemon mixture into the rest of the soup
